name: Honeycomb Empire Full Version
description:
"DRONES I REQUIRE HONEY" "BRING ME HONEY" Satiate your Queen's hunger for honey while defending her from waves of incoming enemies. Build up your economy so that you can become strong enough to over power the waves.

Full Version Includes:

- Audio & Music

- Weather System

- All intended upgrades are in.

- Royal Bug enemy unit.

- Difficulty Slider On Main Menu
